channel.title: Google | Probably the best rewards site ever!
channel.description:
What is google? google is a rewards site, where you do surveys or post on the forum to earn credits then, you use these credits to redeem a prize, and you can claim your prize anytime.
Is this a scam, am I just going to waste my time? You're not wasting your time, scamming doesn't get you far in life, and we aim to build a rep that will last for years.
Awesome where do I sign up? *SNIP* Happy googling!
